Tests package

Description

This is a module for running the Visia-Science tests. It contains integration tests and unit tests for the Visia-Science project.

Submodules

tests.test_integration module

Description

Integration tests for the visia package.

tests.test_main_module module

Description

Unit tests for the visia main module.

a Car object.

Return type:

Car

Returns:
